code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LinearLayer=_ref=>{let{inputSize=128,outputSize=64,bias=true,activation='none'}=_ref;const[localActivation,setLocalActivation]=useState(activation);const handleActivationChange=event=>{setLocalActivation(event.target.value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'8px',backgroundColor:'#2a2a2a',borderRadius:'4px',minWidth:'120px',textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontWeight:'bold',marginBottom:'4px',color:'#4caf50'},children:"Linear Layer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontSize:'12px',color:'#ccc'},children:["Input: ",inputSize]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontSize:'12px',color:'#ccc'},children:["Output: ",outputSize]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontSize:'10px',color:'#888',marginTop:'4px'},children:["Bias: ",bias?'Yes':'No']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontSize:'10px',color:'#888',marginTop:'4px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Activation: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:localActivation,onChange:handleActivationChange,style:{backgroundColor:'rgba(40, 44, 52, 0.9)',border:'1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)',color:'#ffffff',padding:'2px 4px',borderRadius:'4px',fontSize:'10px',outline:'none'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"relu",style:{backgroundColor:'#2d2d3a',color:'white'},children:"ReLU"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"sigmoid",style:{backgroundColor:'#2d2d3a',color:'white'},children:"Sigmoid"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"tanh",style:{backgroundColor:'#2d2d3a',color:'white'},children:"Tanh"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"none",style:{backgroundColor:'#2d2d3a',color:'white'},children:"None"})]})]})]});};export default LinearLayer;
